an5.50:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma narado pataliputte viharati kukkutarame.
an5.50:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena mundassa ranno bhadda devi kalankata hoti piya manapa.
an5.50:1.3: So bhaddaya deviya kalankataya piyaya manapaya neva nhayati na vilimpati na bhattam bhunjati na kammantam payojeti—
an5.50:1.5: Atha kho mundo raja piyakam kosarakkham amantesi:
an5.50:1.6: “tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddaya deviya sariram ayasaya teladoniya pakkhipitva annissa ayasaya doniya patikujjatha, yatha mayam bhaddaya deviya sariram cirataram passeyyama”ti.
an5.50:1.7: “Evam, deva”ti kho piyako kosarakkho mundassa ranno patissutva bhaddaya deviya sariram ayasaya teladoniya pakkhipitva annissa ayasaya doniya patikujji.
an5.50:2.2: “imassa kho mundassa ranno bhadda devi kalankata piya manapa.
an5.50:2.3: So bhaddaya deviya kalankataya piyaya manapaya neva nhayati na vilimpati na bhattam bhunjati na kammantam payojeti—
an5.50:2.5: Kam nu kho mundo raja samanam va brahmanam va payirupaseyya, yassa dhammam sutva sokasallam pajaheyya”ti.
an5.50:3.2: “ayam kho ayasma narado pataliputte viharati kukkutarame.
an5.50:3.3: Tam kho panayasmantam naradam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.50:3.4: ‘pandito viyatto medhavi bahussuto cittakathi kalyanapatibhano vuddho ceva araha ca’.
an5.50:3.5: Yannuna mundo raja ayasmantam naradam payirupaseyya, appeva nama mundo raja ayasmato naradassa dhammam sutva sokasallam pajaheyya”ti.
an5.50:4.1: Atha kho piyako kosarakkho yena mundo raja tenupasankami; upasankamitva mundam rajanam etadavoca:
an5.50:4.2: “ayam kho, deva, ayasma narado pataliputte viharati kukkutarame.
an5.50:4.3: Tam kho panayasmantam naradam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.50:4.4: ‘pandito viyatto medhavi bahussuto cittakathi kalyanapatibhano vuddho ceva araha ca’.
an5.50:4.5: Yadi pana devo ayasmantam naradam payirupaseyya, appeva nama devo ayasmato naradassa dhammam sutva sokasallam pajaheyya”ti.
an5.50:4.6: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, ayasmantam naradam pativedehi.
an5.50:4.7: Kathanhi nama madiso samanam va brahmanam va vijite vasantam pubbe appatisamvidito upasankamitabbam manneyya”ti.
an5.50:4.8: “Evam, deva”ti kho piyako kosarakkho mundassa ranno patissutva yenayasma narado tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam naradam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho piyako kosarakkho ayasmantam naradam etadavoca:
an5.50:5.1: “Imassa, bhante, mundassa ranno bhadda devi kalankata piya manapa.
an5.50:5.2: So bhaddaya deviya kalankataya piyaya manapaya neva nhayati na vilimpati na bhattam bhunjati na kammantam payojeti—
an5.50:5.4: Sadhu, bhante, ayasma narado mundassa ranno tatha dhammam desetu yatha mundo raja ayasmato naradassa dhammam sutva sokasallam pajaheyya”ti.
an5.50:6.1: Atha kho piyako kosarakkho utthayasana ayasmantam naradam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena mundo raja tenupasankami; upasankamitva mundam rajanam etadavoca:
an5.50:6.4: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, bhadrani bhadrani yanani yojapehi”ti.
an5.50:6.5: “Evam, deva”ti kho piyako kosarakkho mundassa ranno patissutva bhadrani bhadrani yanani yojapetva mundam rajanam etadavoca:
an5.50:6.6: “yuttani kho te, deva, bhadrani bhadrani yanani.
an5.50:7.1: Atha kho mundo raja bhadram yanam abhiruhitva bhadrehi bhadrehi yanehi yena kukkutaramo tena payasi mahacca rajanubhavena ayasmantam naradam dassanaya.
an5.50:7.2: Yavatika yanassa bhumi yanena gantva, yana paccorohitva pattikova aramam pavisi.
an5.50:7.3: Atha kho mundo raja yena ayasma narado tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam naradam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho mundam rajanam ayasma narado etadavoca:
an5.50:8.1: “Pancimani, maharaja, alabbhaniyani thanani samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.50:8.3: ‘Jaradhammam ma jiri’ti alabbhaniyam thanam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.50:8.4: ‘Byadhidhammam ma byadhiyi’ti …pe… ‘maranadhammam ma miyi’ti … ‘khayadhammam ma khiyi’ti … ‘nassanadhammam ma nassi’ti alabbhaniyam thanam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.50:9.2: So jaradhamme jinne na iti patisancikkhati:
an5.50:9.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jaradhammam jirati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam jaradhammam jirati.
an5.50:9.4: Ahanceva kho pana jaradhamme jinne soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.50:9.5: So jaradhamme jinne socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an5.50:9.7: ‘assutava puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attanamyeva paritapeti’.
an5.50:10.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, assutavato puthujjanassa byadhidhammam byadhiyati …pe… maranadhammam miyati … khayadhammam khiyati … nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.50:10.2: So nassanadhamme natthe na iti patisancikkhati:
an5.50:10.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhammam nassati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.50:10.4: Ahanceva kho pana nassanadhamme natthe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.50:10.5: So nassanadhamme natthe socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an5.50:10.7: ‘assutava puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attanamyeva paritapeti’.
an5.50:11.1: Sutavato ca kho, maharaja, ariyasavakassa jaradhammam jirati.
an5.50:11.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jaradhammam jirati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam jaradhammam jirati.
an5.50:11.4: Ahanceva kho pana jaradhamme jinne soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.50:11.5: So jaradhamme jinne na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an5.50:11.7: ‘sutava ariyasavako abbuhi savisam sokasallam, yena viddho assutava puthujjano attanamyeva paritapeti.
an5.50:12.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, sutavato ariyasavakassa byadhidhammam byadhiyati …pe… maranadhammam miyati … khayadhammam khiyati … nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.50:12.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhammam nassati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.50:12.4: Ahanceva kho pana nassanadhamme natthe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.50:12.5: So nassanadhamme natthe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an5.50:12.7: ‘sutava ariyasavako abbuhi savisam sokasallam, yena viddho assutava puthujjano attanamyeva paritapeti.
an5.50:13.1: Imani kho, maharaja, panca alabbhaniyani thanani samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasminti.
an5.50:18.1: Evam vutte, mundo raja ayasmantam naradam etadavoca:
an5.50:18.5: Imanhi me, bhante, dhammapariyayam sutva sokasallam pahinan”ti.
an5.50:19.1: Atha kho mundo raja piyakam kosarakkham amantesi:
an5.50:19.2: “tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddaya deviya sariram jhapetha; thupancassa karotha.
an5.50:19.3: Ajjatagge dani mayam nhayissama ceva vilimpissama bhattanca bhunjissama kammante ca payojessama”ti.
